title: Happy Birthday Poems for a Friend to Make Their Day Extra Special

steps.title: A Birthday Wish for You
steps.content: A Birthday Wish for You A day to celebrate your birth A precious soul, from heaven to earth With each passing year, you've blossomed Into a beautiful person, so awesome. Your heart is as pure as gold And your spirit, forever bold You spread joy wherever you go With your warmth, you make hearts glow. On this day, I wish for you All the happiness, that's long overdue May your dreams come true, my dear friend Happy birthday, you truly deserve it in the end. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Another Year
steps.content: Another Year I'm wishing you another year Of laughter, joy and fun, Surprises, love and happiness, And when your birthday's done, I hope you feel deep in your heart, As your birthdays come and go, How very much you mean to me, More than you can know. Joanna Fuchs

steps.title: Every One of Your Birthdays
steps.content: Every One of Your Birthdays Every one of your birthdays is a gift to the rest of us who have had the pleasure of having you in our lives for another year. Every one of your birthdays brings joyful memories of your bright smile and your love of life. Every one of your birthdays reminds us of your sensitivity and service to others, and other delights too numerous to name that we are gifted with just by knowing you. Happy Birthday to one in a million May you, and we enjoy many more. Joanna Fuchs [2] X Research source

steps.title: It’s Your Birthday Today
steps.content: It’s Your Birthday Today It’s your birthday today, Be thankful to the Almighty, It’s your birthday today, Blessing upon you he will lay. It’s your birthday today, Another year unfolds your way, It’s your birthday today, Spend it in the most special way. It’s your birthday today, A day worth storing in your memory, It’s your birthday today, Let love rule your heart every single day. It’s your birthday today, Make friends a plenty, It’s your birthday today, Give smiles to many. It’s your birthday today, Be nothing else but happy It’s your birthday today, Take the sadness away. It’s your birthday today, People are ready to party It’s your birthday today, Champagnes are now ready. Because, it’s your birthday today, Wish all the best that life can be. Henry Wagas

steps.title: Today’s Your Day
steps.content: Today’s Your Day Today’s your day, make a wish, Celebrate with a delicious dish After that it's present time, My present to you is this wonderful rhyme, I know it's not great, But it's all I could create, This next word I'm going to say is very true, I'm only saying it once, I love you. Victoria Tran [3] X Research source

steps.title: Best Birthday Ever
steps.content: Best Birthday Ever May this birthday be your best birthday ever, full of light and laughter, a fireworks explosion of joy. May this birthday live in your memory forever, creating happiness and satisfaction whenever you remember it. Happy, happy birthday! Joanna Fuchs [4] X Research source

steps.title: My Love and Care
steps.content: My Love and Care Hey, I just want to say, Have a happy birthday. I just want to share, My love and care. I love you so much, I want to give you treats and such. This feeling is true, Oh I love you! Sarah Crawford [5] X Research source

steps.title: Birthday Wishes to a Supportive Friend
steps.content: Birthday Wishes to a Supportive Friend A friend like you is a gift from God, Tough to find at home or abroad. You were a great support and wiped away my tears, What would I have done without you all these years. Dear friend, on your birthday, I send the best of wishes to make you happy in every way. Happy Birthday Dear!

steps.title: Unforgettable Friend
steps.content: Unforgettable Friend Yesterday was a day to remember, For it gave me a friend I can never forget ever. Today, I look forward for your birthday, And celebrate like it is an exotic holiday. Tomorrow I see you as an important part of my life, A gift when I think of it makes me feel extremely nice. Have a gorgeous Birthday My Friend!

steps.title: Birthday Wishes for a Sweetheart Friend
steps.content: Birthday Wishes for a Sweetheart Friend Bought some balloons for this day, Baked you an awesome cake, My feelings are pure, There is nothing fake, Happy birthday to the sweetest friend in my life, Without you it is tough to survive, Have a blasting day! [6] X Research source

steps.title: Happy Birthday, Old Friend
steps.content: Happy Birthday, Old Friend Congratulations to you, my old friend, Birthday wishes to you, I send. You look good for your age, I could say, But you look good to me any day. When I look in the mirror, I sigh, 'Cause I know the mirror doesn't lie. You're aging like me, so you see You're getting to be an old guy. Karl Fuchs [7] X Research source

steps.title: To my Best Pal
steps.content: To my Best Pal Happy birthday to my best pal dear, You bring joy into my life year after year. I'm grateful for the memories we've made, And know our friendship will never fade. [8] X Research source

steps.title: A Special Wish For My Buddy
steps.content: A Special Wish For My Buddy Happy birthday to my dear friend, With you I just don't need to pretend, You know what's on my mind, You are so genuine and kind, I am so lucky; I have you as my friend, Happy birthday dear friend!

steps.title: Have A Crazy Day Ahead
steps.content: Have A Crazy Day Ahead May you have a great start this day, Wish you a very special birthday, My dear friend, may you get everything today, Make the most of your birthday, Enjoy and have some fun, You are a rock star, will remain the number one, Happy birthday!

steps.title: A Rocking Day Awaits
steps.content: A Rocking Day Awaits Dear friend, We shared all our smiles and tears, With you there is no question or fear, You are my best friend and will always stay, Irrespective of situations, Come what may, Happy birthday! Have an extra awesome day! [9] X Research source

steps.title: Through Thick and Thin
steps.content: Through Thick and Thin Through thick and thin We'll always be together; Forever firm in sunshine Or even in stormy weather. For better we'll stay strong, Never will we be in doubt; Even for worse we'll be brave, There's nothing to worry about. Yes, in health and wellness I'm yours forever faithfully; Even in severe sickness In you I trust eternally. We'll enjoy the moment In our one happy hour; If it becomes a lonely life, We won't fear where we are. For richer we will share Our harmonious home; For poorer we'll get even closer For love isn't gold, silver or chrome. Our love for each other Is growing from deep within; Our hearts won't be broken Through thick and thin. Bernard F. Asuncion [10] X Research source

steps.title: Happy Birthday To My BFF
steps.content: Happy Birthday To My BFF Candles and cakes just for you, Feel the magic as everything is new, My friend my best wishes for you this day, I just have some words to say, Stay blessed and have an awesome day, Wish you a very happy birthday! [11] X Research source

[12] X Research source

steps.title: You are Special!
steps.content: You are Special! You are the best person I have ever known, Thanks my friend for being in my life, Without you I really would not survive, Happy birthday to you my dear, Stay blessed and spread the cheer, Happy birthday! Have a nice day! [13] X Research source

steps.title: I Miss You on Your Birthday
steps.content: I Miss You on Your Birthday I miss you on your birthday, Not only for your smile, But for the piece of me that's gone, Left within your care. I'm in an empty hallway And have been for awhile, Gazing inwardly towards home, Neither here nor there. How quickly we've turned distant! The months pass by like years. How could friends so inseparable So soon seem so apart! How imprecise the instant Held hostage by my tears! Though Time may seem insatiable, I have you in my heart. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Untitled
steps.content: Untitled Though miles apart, you’re close at heart, Distance can’t keep our friendship apart. On your birthday, I send my love, Wishing you blessings from above. Happy Birthday, my faraway friend, Our bond is one that’ll never end. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Another Birthday, Another Wrinkle
steps.content: Another Birthday, Another Wrinkle Another birthday, another wrinkle, But fret not my friend, you still twinkle. Age may bring lines, but it also brings grace, And you, my dear, have it in abundance, no trace. Sure, we may need glasses to read, And we can't party all night like we used to, indeed. But with every year that passes, we gain more sass, So let's embrace our wrinkles and raise a glass. Another year older, but still young at heart, We'll dance and laugh like we did from the start. So here's to you, my aging friend, Happy birthday, may our wrinkles never end.

steps.title: Happy Birthday, You Old Geezer!
steps.content: Happy Birthday, You Old Geezer! It's your birthday, my dear old friend, Another year, time sure does bend! We've shared laughter, adventures, and more, Together, we've been through life's door. Don't worry about the gray in your hair, Or the wrinkles that seem to appear. You're a year wiser, full of zest, That's what matters, above the rest! Let's celebrate your special day, With a toast and a hip-hip-hooray! We'll party until the sun comes up, Filling your day with love and luck! [16] X Research source

steps.title: Age and Laughter
steps.content: Age and Laughter Happy birthday, you’re not getting old, Stay in the game, it’s not time to fold. Wrinkles and grey hair, are just a new look, Countless experiences, you should write in a book. A birthday is seldom, a serious occasion, Try not to take it, like the d-day invasion. Laughter and jokes are within sight, Stock up on both, all through the night. Martin Dejnicki

steps.title: Young at Heart
steps.content: Young at Heart Happy birthday young at heart, So many decades, where to start? With energy, like that pink bunny, You make us look lazy, that’s not funny! Never-ending old school ways, Filled with stories, to Amaze! Listening has been lost with age, You belong on the theatre stage. If you manage to forget, we’ll remind you, don’t you fret. Happy birthday young at heart, Smile with joy, you old fart. Martin Dejnicki [17] X Research source

steps.title: Untitled
steps.content: Untitled On your birthday every year, I thank the stars you were born. For without you in my life, My love would be forlorn. As each year brings new tests, I know how glad I feel, That you're with me every day, Making my life more real. Kevin Nishmas

steps.title: Perfect Birthday
steps.content: Perfect Birthday On your birthday I wish you much pleasure and joy; I hope all of your wishes come true. May each hour and minute be filled with delight, And your birthday will be perfect for you! Joanna Fuchs [18] X Research source

steps.title: Forever Friends
steps.content: Forever Friends Friendship like ours is truly rare, A bond so strong, a connection we share. On your birthday, I want you to know, I'll always be here, wherever you go.

steps.title: Celebrating You
steps.content: Celebrating You Today is a day to celebrate you, my dear, For all the happiness, you bring every year. I'm grateful for your laughter and your smiles, Happy birthday, let's celebrate in style! [19] X Research source

steps.content: Happy Belated Birthday! Happy Belated Birthday, my dear! I hope it was happy and full of cheer, God bless you, my friend; And lots of happiness to you I do send. steps.title: With Joy And Love
steps.content: With Joy And Love As another year dawns upon your life, With joy and love, I pen these lines. A Christian birthday poem, heartfelt and true, To celebrate the blessings God has bestowed on you. Each birthday is a gentle reminder, Of the grace and mercy God extends forever. For in His divine plan, you were destined to be, A brilliant light, shining for all to see. C. A. Lynch

steps.title: His Divine Presence
steps.content: His Divine Presence As we celebrate your birthday today, another year of life, Let's remember our purpose, to shine with love so bright. To spread God's word, His love and his tender care, For in His divine presence, we find solace and repair. Happy birthday, dear friend, may your faith grow strong, May you continue to journey, knowing you belong. To a greater purpose, with blessings yet untold, In the arms of our Father, where eternal life unfolds. C. A. Lynch [22] X Research source

steps.title: A Special Day
steps.content: A Special Day On this special day, we celebrate with cheer, A birthday, a blessing, a day that's so dear. In the light of life, your journey unfolds, With faith as your guide, as your story is told. May you find peace in each passing year, And love from above, forever near. With every sunrise, a new chapter begins, In this beautiful journey, may you have peace within. As you blow out the candles, make a wish, it's true, May God's grace and love always shine on you. For your faith and spirit, we truly admire, Happy birthday, dear one, to us you inspire. Catherine Pulsifer

steps.title: With Love And Blessings
steps.content: With Love And Blessings On this day, we celebrate with joy so true, God's precious gift, that's truly you. In our lives, a blessing you've become, A radiant light, like the morning sun. So we celebrate on this special day, With love and blessings, we truly say: You're a gift from God, forever true, Happy birthday, and God bless you! Catherine Pulsifer [23] X Research source

steps.title: Infinite Friendship

[24] X Research source

steps.title: A Friendship to Cherish

As you blow out the candles, make a wish come true, May your birthday be filled with joy, through and through. I'm grateful for our friendship, a bond so strong, Together, we'll make memories, all life long. [26] X Research source

steps.title: The Journey of Years
steps.content: The Journey of Years With each year, a new journey begins, A path of growth, with losses and wins. To my friend, on this special date, May your journey be nothing but great. In the book of life, a splendid chapter, Filled with laughter, to capture thereafter.

steps.title: The Canvas of Life
steps.content: The Canvas of Life The canvas of life, with colors so bright, On your birthday, shines with light. Each stroke, a memory, a moment dear, In the art of living, you are a seer. May this year add more hues, To a life, vibrant and true. [27] X Research source

steps.title: Decide on a poem style or format.
steps.content: Decide on a poem style or format. If you’re uncomfortable writing a birthday poem, stick to a shorter format. If you’re a poetry-loving creative type, go for multiple stanzas. Will your poem rhyme all the way through or will you instead focus on the mood and feeling of words you choose? Don’t overstep here, because quality is much more important than quantity when it comes to writing a birthday poem for a friend. [28] X Research source It’s hard enough to know what to write in a birthday card , but you have a lot of choices when it comes to poem formats. Poet Alicia Cook notes that “there's no black and white way you must format your poem–that's really up to the creator. You could do the standard metered and rhymed poetry, haikus, or both free-form and free-verse styles, which don't need to rhyme.”

steps.title: Think about what themes are most appropriate.
steps.content: Think about what themes are most appropriate. If your friend is celebrating a milestone birthday, focus on how important the date is. If it’s just another birthday to them, use celebratory words that make them feel special. The themes you choose can vary from writing about their favorite hobby to the type of birthday cake they plan on enjoying. Pick whatever topic you feel will make them smile when they read your poem. [29] X Research source

steps.title: Personalize your birthday poem with memories and anecdotes.
steps.content: Personalize your birthday poem with memories and anecdotes. If you’ve been friends for a long time, talk about one special memory you both share. Choose an anecdote that speaks to what kind of person they are and what makes them such a great friend. Include memories that are appropriate and don’t have ultra-private details in them. Consider your friend’s age, personality, and preferences about sharing when including personal feelings in the poem. [30] X Research source

steps.title: Get creative with how you present your birthday poem.
steps.content: Get creative with how you present your birthday poem. If you post it on social media, choose a special photo of your friend or of the two of you that fits the theme of the poem. When sending a birthday poem with a gift or in a card, think about using special stationery so it stands out. You can also create a unique keepsake by framing your birthday poem so they can hang it up at home. If you plan on reading your poem at a birthday party, make sure it’s appropriate for the birthday guy or gal, along with the invited guests. [31] X Research source
